name: Decay of Terethia Chapter 1
description:
Decay of Terethia, chapter 1, is the first part of an adventure RPG I created initially as a project to help me learn to code. It soon grew into a game with exploration, maps, quests and monster battles.

You play as a scientist investigating high levels of radiation found in local wildlife, and soon learn about a connection with particular animals named Meeba - who also aid you in battle against the dangerous creatures outside your village.
